title: How to watch Austria vs . France - UEFA Euro 2024 : Group Stage | Channel , stream , preview
body_text:
DUSSELDORF -- UEFA Euro 2024 sees one of the better nations in European football begin their quest for a major championship, as France takes on Austria in Group D action on Monday.
- Watch UEFA Euro 2024 on FuboTV (7-day free trial)
France has all of the firepower to win it all. Just a couple of years removed from coming so close to winning the FIFA World Cup, Didier Deschamps’ crew comes to Germany with expectations of easily advancing beyond the group stage, and then some. They are led by one of the greatest players today, Kylian Mbappe. The new Real Madrid star is hoping to help his return to past glory. They were not able to challenge for the title are Euro 2020, but with players like N’Golo Kante supporting Mbappe, Les Bleus is going to be a tough team to beat.
Austria is not on anyone’s radar as a favorite to win Group D, let alone be a semifinalist. However, they should not be taken lightly. Marcel Sabitzer made a name for himself on a Borussia Dortmund squad that advanced to the UEFA Champions League Final. Ralf Rangnick’s team has played well in friendlies leading up to the tournament, but depth will be a concern if and when they get to the knockout stages.
France is 13-3-9 in all competitions against Austria, with the French beating and drawing with the Austrians during the 2022-23 UEFA Nations League season.
UEFA EURO 2024: GROUP D
Austria vs. France
When: Monday, June 17
Time: 3 p.m. ET
Where: Dusseldorf Stadium (Dusseldorf, Germany)
Channel: FOX
Stream: FuboTV (Free Trial), Sling, DirecTV Stream
